PackageOracle.name: DA_OPPORTUNITY
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_OPPORTUNITY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.03.380723000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,decision_level_cd IN VARCHAR2
,deal_complete_days_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_close_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_committed_ind IN NUMBER
,opportunity_desc IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_lead_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_nm IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_open_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_probability_rate IN NUMBER
,opportunity_revenue_size_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_revenue_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_starting_value_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_visibility_cd IN VARCHAR2
,parent_opportunity_id IN NUMBER
,sales_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec

,deal_complete_days_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_close_dttm IN TIMESTAMP

,opportunity_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_visibility_cd IN VARCHAR2
,parent_opportunity_id IN NUMBER
,sales_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,decision_level_cd IN VARCHAR2
,deal_complete_days_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_close_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_committed_ind IN NUMBER
,opportunity_desc IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_id IN NUMBER
,opportunity_lead_type_cd IN VARCHAR2

,opportunity_open_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_probability_rate IN NUMBER

,opportunity_revenue_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_starting_value_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_type_cd IN VARCHAR2

);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,opportunity_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_opportunity;

body.name: DA_OPPORTUNITY
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_OPPORTUNITY
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.03.394840000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,decision_level_cd IN VARCHAR2
,deal_complete_days_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_close_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_committed_ind IN NUMBER
,opportunity_desc IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_lead_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_nm IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_open_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_probability_rate IN NUMBER
,opportunity_revenue_size_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_revenue_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_starting_value_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_visibility_cd IN VARCHAR2
,parent_opportunity_id IN NUMBER
,sales_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_opportunity.add(fx), parms=' || channel_type_cd || '|' || decision_level_cd || '|' || deal_complete_days_cd || '|' || opportunity_close_dttm || '|' || opportunity_committed_ind || '|' || opportunity_desc || '|' || opportunity_lead_type_cd || '|' || opportunity_nm || '|' || opportunity_open_dttm || '|' || opportunity_probability_rate || '|' || opportunity_revenue_size_cd || '|' || opportunity_revenue_type_cd || '|' || opportunity_starting_value_cd || '|' || opportunity_type_cd || '|' || opportunity_visibility_cd || '|' || parent_opportunity_id || '|' || sales_method_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_opportunity a
(
a.channel_type_cd
,a.decision_level_cd
,a.deal_complete_days_cd
,a.opportunity_close_dttm
,a.opportunity_committed_ind
,a.opportunity_desc
,a.opportunity_id
,a.opportunity_lead_type_cd
,a.opportunity_nm
,a.opportunity_open_dttm
,a.opportunity_probability_rate
,a.opportunity_revenue_size_cd
,a.opportunity_revenue_type_cd
,a.opportunity_starting_value_cd
,a.opportunity_type_cd
,a.opportunity_visibility_cd
,a.parent_opportunity_id
,a.sales_method_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.channel_type_cd
,add.decision_level_cd
,add.deal_complete_days_cd
,add.opportunity_close_dttm
,add.opportunity_committed_ind
,add.opportunity_desc
,chtr.s_opportunity_id.NEXTVAL
,add.opportunity_lead_type_cd
,add.opportunity_nm
,add.opportunity_open_dttm
,add.opportunity_probability_rate
,add.opportunity_revenue_size_cd
,add.opportunity_revenue_type_cd
,add.opportunity_starting_value_cd
,add.opportunity_type_cd
,add.opportunity_visibility_cd
,add.parent_opportunity_id
,add.sales_method_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.opportunity_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_opportunity.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,decision_level_cd IN VARCHAR2
,deal_complete_days_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_close_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_committed_ind IN NUMBER
,opportunity_desc IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_lead_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_nm IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_open_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_probability_rate IN NUMBER
,opportunity_revenue_size_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_revenue_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_starting_value_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_visibility_cd IN VARCHAR2
,parent_opportunity_id IN NUMBER
,sales_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_opportunity.add, parms=' || channel_type_cd || '|' || decision_level_cd || '|' || deal_complete_days_cd || '|' || opportunity_close_dttm || '|' || opportunity_committed_ind || '|' || opportunity_desc || '|' || opportunity_lead_type_cd || '|' || opportunity_nm || '|' || opportunity_open_dttm || '|' || opportunity_probability_rate || '|' || opportunity_revenue_size_cd || '|' || opportunity_revenue_type_cd || '|' || opportunity_starting_value_cd || '|' || opportunity_type_cd || '|' || opportunity_visibility_cd || '|' || parent_opportunity_id || '|' || sales_method_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_opportunity a
(
a.channel_type_cd
,a.decision_level_cd
,a.deal_complete_days_cd
,a.opportunity_close_dttm
,a.opportunity_committed_ind
,a.opportunity_desc
,a.opportunity_id
,a.opportunity_lead_type_cd
,a.opportunity_nm
,a.opportunity_open_dttm
,a.opportunity_probability_rate
,a.opportunity_revenue_size_cd
,a.opportunity_revenue_type_cd
,a.opportunity_starting_value_cd
,a.opportunity_type_cd
,a.opportunity_visibility_cd
,a.parent_opportunity_id
,a.sales_method_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.channel_type_cd
,add.decision_level_cd
,add.deal_complete_days_cd
,add.opportunity_close_dttm
,add.opportunity_committed_ind
,add.opportunity_desc
,chtr.s_opportunity_id.NEXTVAL
,add.opportunity_lead_type_cd
,add.opportunity_nm
,add.opportunity_open_dttm
,add.opportunity_probability_rate
,add.opportunity_revenue_size_cd
,add.opportunity_revenue_type_cd
,add.opportunity_starting_value_cd
,add.opportunity_type_cd
,add.opportunity_visibility_cd
,add.parent_opportunity_id
,add.sales_method_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_opportunity.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,channel_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,decision_level_cd IN VARCHAR2
,deal_complete_days_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_close_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_committed_ind IN NUMBER
,opportunity_desc IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_id IN NUMBER
,opportunity_lead_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_nm IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_open_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,opportunity_probability_rate IN NUMBER
,opportunity_revenue_size_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_revenue_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_starting_value_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,opportunity_visibility_cd IN VARCHAR2
,parent_opportunity_id IN NUMBER
,sales_method_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_opportunity.add, parms=' || channel_type_cd || '|' || decision_level_cd || '|' || deal_complete_days_cd || '|' || opportunity_close_dttm || '|' || opportunity_committed_ind || '|' || opportunity_desc || '|' || opportunity_id || '|' || opportunity_lead_type_cd || '|' || opportunity_nm || '|' || opportunity_open_dttm || '|' || opportunity_probability_rate || '|' || opportunity_revenue_size_cd || '|' || opportunity_revenue_type_cd || '|' || opportunity_starting_value_cd || '|' || opportunity_type_cd || '|' || opportunity_visibility_cd || '|' || parent_opportunity_id || '|' || sales_method_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_opportunity a
(
a.channel_type_cd
,a.decision_level_cd
,a.deal_complete_days_cd
,a.opportunity_close_dttm
,a.opportunity_committed_ind
,a.opportunity_desc
,a.opportunity_id
,a.opportunity_lead_type_cd
,a.opportunity_nm
,a.opportunity_open_dttm
,a.opportunity_probability_rate
,a.opportunity_revenue_size_cd
,a.opportunity_revenue_type_cd
,a.opportunity_starting_value_cd
,a.opportunity_type_cd
,a.opportunity_visibility_cd
,a.parent_opportunity_id
,a.sales_method_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.channel_type_cd
,add.decision_level_cd
,add.deal_complete_days_cd
,add.opportunity_close_dttm
,add.opportunity_committed_ind
,add.opportunity_desc
,add.opportunity_id
,add.opportunity_lead_type_cd
,add.opportunity_nm
,add.opportunity_open_dttm
,add.opportunity_probability_rate
,add.opportunity_revenue_size_cd
,add.opportunity_revenue_type_cd
,add.opportunity_starting_value_cd
,add.opportunity_type_cd
,add.opportunity_visibility_cd
,add.parent_opportunity_id
,add.sales_method_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_opportunity.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,opportunity_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_opportunity.del, parms=' || opportunity_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_opportunity a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.opportunity_id = del.opportunity_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_opportunity.del');

END del;

END da_opportunity;
